Projects.Name: Chat with LLM using pdf and SQL Database in Natural Language
Projects.Description:
Developed a system using LLM (in this case Gemini) for three functionalities:
1) Chat with an LLM
2) Querying PDF, Text documents
3) Natural Language queries on an SQL database + LLM.
Projects.Tech Stack: Python, LLM (Gemini), Embeddings, LangChain, React, Django

Projects.Name: Real-Time Binary Classification + Gesture control
Projects.Description:
Created a tool that uses a webcam to collect data and instantly train a CNN model to classify objects.
This tool learns from the data it collects, improving its identification capabilities over time.
Integrated a Django web app for real-time object classification alongside gesture control features, allowing users to adjust volume and brightness with simple hand gestures.
Projects.Tech Stack: CNN, OpenCV, Python, JavaScript, Django, React

Projects.Name: MakeMore: Text Generation with RNNs
Projects.Description:
Developed a character-level recurrent neural network (RNN) inspired by Andrej Karpathy's MakeMore series to generate text sequences.
Implemented various RNN architectures, including LSTM and GRU, to experiment with different sequence modelling capabilities.
Trained the models on diverse text datasets, optimizing hyperparameters to improve text generation quality.
Applied Backpropagation in Neural Networks from Scratch.
